TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ReportViewerCookieCollection extends Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.SyncList`1<class System.Net.Cookie>

remarks.format:
## Remarks The ReportViewerCookieCollection class provides a simple collection object that can be used to store a set of <xref:System.Net.Cookie?displayProperty=fullName> objects.
For more information, see the <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ServerReport.Cookies%2A> property in <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ServerReport>.
